    • processToXMLChars

      public static java.lang.String processToXMLChars​(java.lang.String pReportText)
      processToXMLChars replaces characters that cannot be represented via XML into XML 1.0 compliant text. (essentially, anything outside of ASCII 7 ) Characters outside that range are replaced with spaces
      Parameters:
      pReportText -
      Returns:
      String
